Desc.entry: A person centred service which offers 24 hour residential care to 12 residents aged 18 and over, with a staffing ratio of 1 staff to 2 residents. Offers support for clients to access the community, any educational and recreational facilities. Serves people with both physical and learning disabilities and has the necessary equipment to support residents with their mobility and encourage residents to participate in the running of the home. Does not offer nursing care but has the availability of district nurses if required. Service provided by Guinness Northern Counties Housing Association and support is provided by Sheffield Health and social Care Trust. Referral via social services. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
